title: Kona: Day One (2.1.0.3) (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_kona_day_one_2.1.0.3.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPEMNT
Change log:
Patch 20160209-01 (10 February 2016)
Notable changes
General Store | Fixed security light over breakers
General Store | Fixed an issue where wolves would get stuck
General Store | Temporarly moved interactor over breakers
Vision #02 | Locked the door to force user to complete it
Loading | Music now fades before loading (avoid stutter)
Menu | Reduced volume of intro music
UI | Removed delay for interactors in the dark
UI | Improved combine lisibility (still wip though)
UI | Combine now always shows what's required.
UI | Fixed bad locked/unlocked iconography
Global | B no longer brings old document back
Hack | Deleting savegames is now allowed with DEL key
Known Major Issues / WIP Features
The game may crash while accessing graphic options
Sound can get corrupted after a while
Initial loading is longuer than desired
Carl cannot die just yet
Journal is being revamped; expected release Feb 15th
